casebody.data:
Columbus Bar Association v. Connors.

[Cite as Columbus Bar Assn. v. Connors (2000), 89 Ohio St.3d 370.]

(No. 99-2232 Submitted March 8, 2000 Decided July 19, 2000.) *372Bruce A. Campbell, Kristy J. Swope and Stanley D. Ross, for relator. John J. Connors, Jr., pro se. Per Curiam.

We adopt the findings, conclusions, and recommendation of the board. We hereby indefinitely suspend respondent from the practice of law. Costs taxed to respondent.

Judgment accordingly.

*373Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer and Cook, JJ., concur. Lundberg Stratton, J., not participating.
